Subject: Galvatron's training
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron felt something curl up in his spark. It was a feeling of  
disappointment. He was hollow in side. He was not able to absorb the sparks 
from his victims. He needed a powerful base to hold them. Such as the matix  
of leadership but he had not enough power for that. But he did have the power 
to take out one who did. Magnus. He gave a quick goodbye to Magma and flew 
out of the base. He flew towards the probe following Magnus.

--part1_11.f29cca2.27a8b93e_boundary
